المماطلة والمكابرة تدفعان نحو الانهيار؟
01 Nov 2019, 22:04 by سابين عويس

Procrastination and arrogance are pushing towards collapse?
01 Nov 2019, 22:04 by Sabine Owais
A new day passed yesterday without the country taking one step on the way out of the emerging crisis due to the resignation of Prime Minister Saad Hariri, while counting the financial crisis working at full speed, bypassing the movement of communications and consultations to agree on the new government. Banks may have succeeded through the measures taken in coordination With the Central Bank, to contain the concerns of dealers, who are scrambling for bank branches in various regions, in pursuit of a process of withdrawal or transfer, but on the other hand fully aware that the cost of time wasted on the political rams around the coming government, will be greater than the ability of banks to protect to her. Time for them is a very important and pressing factor in determining the horizon of the next stage and its title, on the basis that the use of time today with positive steps sends serious signals to the markets internally and externally, that will contribute to the restoration of some of the lost confidence, reducing the pressure (justified) on the banks, and given a dose Oxygen for a faltering economy under consecutive blows.
